comment._content: Professor and dean of faculty of Law at Cornell, appointed to the New York Public Service Commission in 1914. books.google.com/books?id=7ahMAAAAYAAJ&pg=PA799&l... (Tried to post a "tinyurl" but Flickr thought it was spam...)

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: There is an editorial in the Cornell Law Quarterly (1916) on his resignation as Dean with lots of professional biographical detail books.google.com/books?id=1zQsAAAAIAAJ&pg=PA257&l...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: rjones0856 and swanq:  Thank you for your information about Frank Irvine, professor and dean at Cornell Law school.  A photo of him from a 1905 publication digitized in Google books (Cornell University, a history)  shows him as a younger man. We will add more information to the description when we update.
